message:
Cloudme.com (iCloud) Whats your opinion?

I have just started using this service today. I havent't really had a chance to fully see the features but it includes cloud storage for docs/pictures/music. You can store your contacts and it provides you with a mail@cloudme.com email address. Plus allows you to load your MSN/Google Chat/ICQ contacts for chat, it even has a calendar.

Its like a virtual computer in the cloud.

I'm interested in more reviews/opinions.
seems to me just another dropbox with unneeded bells and whistles. still waiting to see what Apple's going to do with it.
for me I think it will be the cloud solution we all be waiting for, it'll work flawlessly between devices. with little setup needed.
@javogc What do you need to configure in Dropbox?
@javogc dropbox actually has a iPhone app that I can download stuff from the web and save directly in my dropbox on my iPhone dropbox right now is the best
wonder if it'll be a mobileme/dropbox conglomeration. hmm...I'll have to see it to determine.
